                &lt;div class="list_li S_line1 clearfix" mid="4095627689989452" action-type="feed_list_item" &gt;

            &lt;div class="list_li S_line1 clearfix" mid="4095627547462306" action-type="feed_list_item" &gt;

    &lt;div class="list_con"&gt;
        &lt;div class="WB_text"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/5702641386" usercard="id=5702641386" node-type="name"&gt;湛湛那年&lt;/a&gt;：&lt;span node-type="text"&gt;平安&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="WB_func clearfix"&gt;
            &lt;div class="WB_handle W_fr"&gt;
                &lt;ul class="clearfix"&gt;
                                                    &lt;li class="hover"&gt;&lt;span class="line S_line1"&gt;

    &lt;div class="WB_face W_fl"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/5911012056" usercard="id=5911012056"&gt;&lt;img src="http://tva2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/006s20g8jw8f71opgvlpqj30ro0rp758.jpg" usercard="id=5911012056" alt="Arturia_D_Pendragon"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

        &lt;div class="WB_text"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="/5911012056" usercard="id=5911012056" node-type="name"&gt;Arturia_D_Pendragon&lt;/a&gt;：&lt;span node-type="text"&gt;我实在是不知道该说什么&lt;img render="ext" src="http://img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/70/88_org.gif" title="[拜拜]" alt=    "[拜拜]" type="face" /&gt;&lt;img render="ext" src="http://img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/70/88_org.gif" title="[拜拜]" alt=    "[拜拜]" type="face" /&gt;&lt;img render="ext" src="http://img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/70/88_org.gif" title="[拜拜]" alt=    "[拜拜]" type="face" /&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

            &lt;div class="WB_handle W_fr"&gt;
                &lt;ul class="clearfix"&gt;
